1.15.2.0.4.4:
*Holy Water and Unholy Water are now have an area of effect of 1 block.

*The Herobrine Spy always despawns after 5 minutes.

*The Herobrine Mage can no longer teleport the player into blocks.

*Upgraded the logic the Herobrine Warrior uses when breaking blocks.

*Improved the Ominous Mineshaft structure that the Herobrine Builder can build.

*Fixed an extremely rare bug that caused Herobrine mobs to be unable to spawn after the alter of herobrine as activated.

+Added Russian Translation, credits to KickDemonAss.

+Added Polish Translation, credits to kubix1006.

+Added support for every variation of English Minecraft supports.

*Tweaked Spawning of every mob added by this mod to be more balanced.

*Made the Suspicious House Structure more common.

*You now need to be holding a Cursed diamond to activate an Alter of Herobrine.

*Lightning now always strikes when activating an Alter of Herobrine.

*Many code optimizations and improvements, may fix some unknown bugs.
